xwikidoc.content: help.tipsPanel.title=Dicas help.tipsPanel.noTipMessage=Sem dicas disponíveis! help.tipsPanel.gettingStartedTip=Se você está iniciando com XWiki, veja o [[Guia para Iniciantes>>https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/GettingStarted/]]. help.tipsPanel.jumpToPageTip=Vá para qualquer página dentro do wiki com Ctrl+G ou Meta+G.\nVeja [[mais atalhos>>https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/KeyboardShortcuts]]. help.tipsPanel.improveXWikiTip=Você sabia que pode melhorar o XWiki? Tire 5 minutos para [[preencher esta avaliação>>https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Survey/ProductFeedback]] e ajude este projeto de código aberto! ### Missing: help.tipsPanel.breadcrumbsTip=You can click on the arrows next to the breadcrumb elements to quickly navigate to sibling and children pages. ### Missing: help.tipsPanel.advancedHiddenShortcutTip=Press the x+x+x+a key combo to toggle the [[Advanced mode>>https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/PageEditing#HSimpleandAdvancededitingmodes]] and x+x+x+h to toggle the display of [[hidden pages>>https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/PageEditing#HHidingPages]]. ### Missing: help.tipsPanel.linkAutocompleteWYSIWYGTip=When editing in WYSIWYG, type ##[## and then start typing letters to get suggestions for creating a link. ### Missing: help.macroList.title=Available Macros ### Missing: help.macroList.id=Id ### Missing: help.macroList.name=Name ### Missing: help.macroList.category=Category ### Missing: help.macroList.description=Description ### Missing: help.macroList.visibility=Visibility
